Dr. Robert M. Bowman, Lt. Col., USAF, ret. will be meeting with members of Valley 9/11 Truth and others invited from the public to share his insights on the Citizens 9/11 Commission Campaign and he will also update on his work.

 

Dr. Bowman is President of the Institute for Space and Security Studies, Executive Vice President of Millennium III Corporation, and retired Presiding Archbishop of the United Catholic Church. The recipient of the Eisenhower Medal, the George F. Kennan Peace Prize, the President's Medal of Veterans for Peace, the Republic Aviation Airpower Award, the Society of American Military Engineers' ROTC Medal of Merit (twice), the Air Medal with five oak leaf clusters, the Meritorious Service Medal, and numerous other awards, he is one of the country's foremost authorities on national security.

Colonel Bowman flew 101 combat missions as a fighter pilot in Vietnam and directed all the DoD "Star Wars" programs under presidents Ford and Carter. He has been an executive in both government and industry, and has chaired 8 major international conferences. Professor Bowman taught at 5 colleges and universities, serving as Department Head and Assistant Dean. His Ph.D. is in Aeronautics and Nuclear Engineering from Caltech. He has lectured at the National War College, the United Nations, Congressional Caucuses, the Academies of Science of six nations, and the House of Lords.

 

My interview on September 20th with Senator Mike Gravel is now posted on youtube in eight segments. Part 8 is an excerpt from a Bob Bowman speech at the May 19, 2011 Oakland forum for ‘Empowering Citizens to End the 9/11 Wars and Restore Lost Liberties.’ I inserted into that last segment, too, Dr. Bowman’s 3-minute WTC-7 blow-out video compilation, (the smoking gun of 9-11) and credits. The entire video will be available in high resolution viewing when posted at www.gctv.org/videos which should happen soon. This segment is now available at youtube.

 

Following here is a 9-12-2011 statement by Robert Bowman, regarding his endorsement for the Citizens 9/11 Commission Campaign:

 

“Having just endured the interminable pablum put out by the mainstream media on the tenth anniversary of 9/11, let us reflect on what’s real. Lots of people in the movement think they know who “did it.” Many think they know how. I’m not so sure. But there are a few things we can ALL agree on. The government’s “Official Conspiracy Theory” is a lie. It is physically impossible. To see a few of the many ways it is impossible, watch any of my many speeches on YouTube. Or go to my web site ThePatriots.us. The point is, we have absolute certainty that it was not just 19 Arabs with box-cutters and an old man on a dialysis machine in a cave. They could not have gotten our air defenses to stand down. They could not have installed the explosives and nanothermite which are proven to have been in the 3 WTC buildings which came down. And they could not have orchestrated the massive destruction of evidence and the coverup which followed 9/11. We need a new independent investigation with subpoena power to expose the government lies and discover the truth. Only then will we be able to reverse the results of 9/11 — disastrous corporate wars of aggression, loss of our Constitutional rights, and the transfer of trillions of dollars from working Americans to the bankers and weapons manufacturers and oil companies. My old friend Senator Mike Gravel is working on a plan to get the investigation we need through Citizen Initiative, first in Massachusetts. I urge everyone to get behind his efforts. The people of Massachusetts should sign the initiative and get their friends and family to do so. Most importantly, when we encounter differences of opinion in the movement over the details of “who” and “how” or over tactics, let us take a deep breath and reflect on the core truths which we all share. We must stand united for the truth, for the truth shall set us free.”

Robert M. Bowman

Lt. Col.. Ph.D., USAF, ret.,
National Commander,  “The Patriots”
Web site – www.thepatriots.us
